name: Intern/Junior C# Backend Developer
description:
Requirements:

Git (GitHub) and basic GitFlow

Familiarity with JIRA, CI/CD tools

Experience in Node.js or ASP.NET Core WebAPI backen

Proficiency in SQL and relational DBs (PostgreSQL/MySQL/MS SQL)

Proficiency in designing and consuming RESTful API or GraphQL

Strong understanding of HTTP protocol (caching, compression etc)

Experience in server-side events and/or WebSockets and/or SignalR

Nice to have (optional):

Experience in WebRTC (Jitsi, Twilio etc) and/or video streaming is a big plus

Experience in Unity WebGL or Three.js or Babylon.js is a big plus

Experience in Google Cloud or Azure is a big plus

Docker exposure – nice to have

If you are a full-stack:

♥️ 1-3 years of experience with Blazor / React or Vue.js

♥️ Understanding of Component-Based Design

♥️ Experience in any kind of UI toolkit (Tailwind, Foundation, Material, Bootstrap, Semantic etc)

Soft skills:

☺️ Willingness to work in an Agile environment

☺️ Strong communication and analytical skills

☺️ Knowledge in software development patterns and key principles of software development

Benefits:

Competitive compensation and paid time off

Flexible work hours

Team of professionals providing you with the opportunity to grow

Corporate library
